front.title: On the fractographic analysis of machining cracks in ground ceramics

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: Public update by NIST of its 24-month building and fire safety investigation of the World Trade Center (WTC) disaster summarizes the progress made since its December 2002 report. NIST expects to release the draft of the final investigation report for public comment in December 2004.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
